ol.li: Open your preferred web browser (firefox, Google Chrome, etc.)

Enter "waveapps.com" into your address bar. This will bring you to the Wave Financlia website homepage.
The first thing you will see is the option to signup.
Enter your email and a usable password. Then Click Create to create your free Waves Financial account.
Now that you have created your free account, it will ask for your name, business name, and what type of business you own. Fill out this information.
After you click Next, different starting points will be offered for you to choose from. You will have four options, the option that works the best for you personally.
After selecting the options, answer if you are already in business or just starting and then click next.

body.p: Select get started, your account will now be operational and you will have access to all of wave Finiancials features.
